faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ImageStudio

free.a: Yes! ImageStudio offers free AI upscaling and image resizing with no signup required. Free users get 5 AI upscales and 20 resizes per day. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited access.

aiUpscaling.a: AI image upscaling uses deep learning models like Real-ESRGAN to intelligently increase image resolution. Unlike traditional methods, AI preserves and even enhances details, resulting in sharper, higher-quality images.

formats.a: ImageStudio supports JPG, PNG, WebP, and GIF formats for both input and output. You can also convert between formats during processing.

privacy.q: What happens to my uploaded images?
privacy.a: Your privacy is our priority. Uploaded images are processed immediately and automatically deleted within 1 hour. We never store, share, or use your images for any other purpose.

maxSize.q: What is the maximum file size?
maxSize.a: Free users can upload images up to 10MB. Pro users can upload images up to 25MB. For AI upscaling, there are resolution limits to ensure quality results.

batch.q: Can I process multiple images at once?
batch.a: Yes! Our batch processing feature lets you resize multiple images at once with the same settings. Upload multiple files and download them all as a ZIP archive.

api.a: Yes, Pro and Business users have access to our REST API for programmatic image processing. Check the API documentation for integration details.

quality.a: We use Real-ESRGAN, one of the best AI upscaling models available. Results are significantly better than traditional bicubic or bilinear interpolation methods.

about.title: About ImageStudio
about.subtitle: Professional image processing tools for everyone

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide professional-grade image processing tools that are accessible to everyone. We believe high-quality image enhancement shouldn't require expensive software or technical expertise.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: ImageStudio is powered by Real-ESRGAN, a state-of-the-art AI model for image super-resolution. Combined with modern web technologies, we deliver fast, high-quality results directly in your browser.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your images are yours. We process and delete, never store.

quality.title: Quality Focus
quality.description: We use the best AI models for superior results.

accessibility.title: Accessible
